## 1. Event Counts by Event type


```{r get counts of events by event_types, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(acledR)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

give_me_counts <- generate_counts(data = params$data, unit_id = "country", time_id = "event_date", time_target = "month", start_date = params$start_date, end_date = params$end_date)

kable(give_me_counts) %>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T)

```
